rds <- list.files(
  path = "./data/longumi1000000",
  pattern = "*.Rdata", full.names = TRUE, recursive = TRUE)
# exclude pacbio subreads data
rds <- rds[!grepl("pb/", rds)]
# qcs: *_qc.Rdata; eps: *_ep.Rdata
qcs <- rds[grep("_qc.Rdata$", rds)]
eps <- rds[grep("_ep.Rdata$", rds)]
df <- data.frame(qc = qcs, ep = eps)
df$data <- gsub("^.*longumi1000000/(.*)/(bin|nobin)/(.*)_qc.Rdata", "\\1", df$qc)
df$bin <- gsub("^.*longumi1000000/(.*)/(bin|nobin)/(.*)_qc.Rdata", "\\2", df$qc)
df$consensus <- gsub("^.*longumi1000000/(.*)/(bin|nobin)/(.*)_qc.Rdata", "\\3", df$qc)

# overview stats
nclusters_from_rds <- function(rds, filter=FALSE, size = NULL) {
  load(rds)
  if (filter) {
    qc <- filter(
      qc,
      !is.na(length) # remove umi bins not aligned to ref.
    )

    # if rds not contains umiCon, use quantile 0, 0.25 , 0.5, 0.75
    if (grepl("umiCon", rds)) {
      breaks <- c(seq(1, 60, 3), Inf)
    } else {
      breaks <- c(quantile(qc$umi_cluster_size)[1:4], Inf)
      }

    outlier <- lu_artefact_plot(
      qc,
      breaks = breaks) %>% 
      .$data %>%
      filter(
      aflag == "lightblue"
      )
    # contamination
    cont <- outlier %>%
    select(umi, ref_ssu_error, silva_ssu_error) %>%
    filter(silva_ssu_error < ref_ssu_error &  0.1 < ref_ssu_error - silva_ssu_error) %>% #nolint
    arrange(desc(ref_ssu_error - silva_ssu_error)) %>%
    mutate(flag = "cont")
    qc <- filter(
      qc,
    !(umi %in% cont$umi)
    )
  }
  if (!is.null(size)) {
    qc <- filter(
      qc,
      umi_cluster_size >= size
    )
  }
  nclusters <- length(unique(qc$umi))
  return(nclusters)
}

nrefs_from_rds <- function(rds, filter=FALSE, size = NULL) {
  load(rds)
  if (filter) {
    qc <- filter(
      qc,
      !is.na(length) # remove umi bins not aligned to ref.
    )

    # if rds not contains umiCon, use quantile 0, 0.25 , 0.5, 0.75
    if (grepl("umiCon", rds)) {
      breaks <- c(seq(1, 60, 3), Inf)
    } else {
      breaks <- c(quantile(qc$umi_cluster_size)[1:4], Inf)
      }

    outlier <- lu_artefact_plot(
      qc,
      breaks = breaks) %>% 
      .$data %>%
      filter(
      aflag == "lightblue"
      )
    # contamination
    cont <- outlier %>%
    select(umi, ref_ssu_error, silva_ssu_error) %>%
    filter(silva_ssu_error < ref_ssu_error &  0.1 < ref_ssu_error - silva_ssu_error) %>% #nolint
    arrange(desc(ref_ssu_error - silva_ssu_error)) %>%
    mutate(flag = "cont")
    qc <- filter(
      qc,
    !(umi %in% cont$umi)
    )
  }
  if (!is.null(size)) {
    qc <- filter(
      qc,
      umi_cluster_size >= size
    )
  }
  # unique ref_tax with no NAs
  nrefs <- sum(!is.na(unique(qc$ref_tax)))
  return(nrefs)
}

chimera_from_rds <- function(rds, filter=TRUE, size = NULL) {
  load(rds)
  if (filter) {
    qc <- filter(
      qc,
      !is.na(length) # remove umi bins not aligned to ref.
    )

    # if rds not contains umiCon, use quantile 0, 0.25 , 0.5, 0.75
    if (grepl("umiCon", rds)) {
      breaks <- c(seq(1, 60, 3), Inf)
    } else {
      breaks <- c(quantile(qc$umi_cluster_size)[1:4], Inf)
      }

    outlier <- lu_artefact_plot(
      qc,
      breaks = breaks) %>% 
      .$data %>%
      filter(
      aflag == "lightblue"
      )
    # contamination
    cont <- outlier %>%
    select(umi, ref_ssu_error, silva_ssu_error) %>%
    filter(silva_ssu_error < ref_ssu_error &  0.1 < ref_ssu_error - silva_ssu_error) %>% #nolint
    arrange(desc(ref_ssu_error - silva_ssu_error)) %>%
    mutate(flag = "cont")
    # chimera
    chi <- outlier %>%
    select(umi, chimera) %>%
    filter(chimera == "Y" & !(umi %in% cont$umi)) %>%
    mutate(flag = "chi")
    if (!is.null(size)) {
      qc <- filter(
        qc,
        umi_cluster_size >= size
        )
      }
    # calculate chimera rate
    chimerate <- qc %>%
    filter(
      !(umi %in% cont$umi),
      ) %>%
      {nrow(chi)/nrow(.)*100}
  }
  else {
    if (!is.null(size)) {
      qc <- filter(
        qc,
        umi_cluster_size >= size
        )
      }
    # chimerate by uchime-ref without extra qc
    chimerate <- qc %>%
    filter(
      chimera == "Y"
      ) %>%
      {nrow(.) / nrow(qc) * 100}
  }
  return(chimerate)
}

stat_bar <- function(df, column, y_lab, y_int=NULL) {
  p <- df %>%
  ggplot(aes(
    y = .data[[column]],

# consensus stats
# merge qcs into one
qc_from_rds <- function(rds, filter = FALSE, size = NULL) {
  load(rds)
  if (filter) {
    qc <- filter(
      qc,
      !is.na(length) # remove umi bins not aligned to ref.
    )

    # if rds not contains umiCon, use quantile 0, 0.25 , 0.5, 0.75
    if (grepl("umiCon", rds)) {
      breaks <- c(seq(1, 60, 3), Inf)
    } else {
      breaks <- c(quantile(qc$umi_cluster_size)[1:4], Inf)
      }

    outlier <- lu_artefact_plot(
      qc,
      breaks = breaks) %>% 
      .$data %>%
      filter(
      aflag == "lightblue"
      )
    # contamination
    cont <- outlier %>%
    select(umi, ref_ssu_error, silva_ssu_error) %>%
    filter(silva_ssu_error < ref_ssu_error &  0.1 < ref_ssu_error - silva_ssu_error) %>% #nolint
    arrange(desc(ref_ssu_error - silva_ssu_error)) %>%
    mutate(flag = "cont")
    # chimera
    chi <- outlier %>%
    select(umi, chimera) %>%
    filter(chimera == "Y" & !(umi %in% cont$umi)) %>%
    mutate(flag = "chi")

    qc <- filter(
      qc,
    !(umi %in% cont$umi),
    !(umi %in% chi$umi),
    )
  }
  if (!is.null(size)) {
    qc <- filter(
      qc,
      umi_cluster_size >= size
    )
  }
  return(qc)
}

stat_jitter_xy <- function(dt, column_x, column_y) {
  p <- dt %>%
  ggplot(aes(
    y = .data[[column_y]], 
    x = .data[[column_x]],
      )) +
  geom_point(
    aes(color = factor(
      data, 
      levels = c("pb_ccs", "zymock_r10", "zymock_r9"),
      labels = c("PacBio CCS", "Nanopore R10", "Nanopore R9")
      ))) +
  scale_color_manual(values = brewer.pal(4, "Spectral")[c(4,2,1)]) +
  facet_grid(
    factor(bin, levels=c("bin", "nobin"), labels = c("K-mer binning on all reads", "No pre-binning")) + #nolint
    factor(data, labels = c("PacBio CCS", "Nanopore R10", "Nanopore R9")) ~ #nolint 
    fct_relevel(consensus, "kmerCon", "isONclustCon", "isONclustCon2", "isONcorCon", "umiCon", "umiConN"), scales = "free") + #nolint
  labs(
    x = "# of reads",
    y = "% of errors",
    color = "Data",
    ) +
  geom_vline(data = dt_cutoff, aes(xintercept = cutoff), linetype = "dashed") + #nolint
  geom_text(data = dt_cutoff, aes(x = x, y = y, label = label), hjust=0, vjust = 1) + #nolint
  theme_prism() +
  theme(
    legend.title = element_text(),
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90),
  )
  return(p)
}

# stat by error type
errorsum_from_rds <- function(rds_qc, rds_ep, filter = FALSE, size= NULL) {
  qcf <- qc_from_rds(rds_qc, filter = filter, size = size)
  load(rds_ep)
  epf <- filter(
    ep,
    sub(";.*", "", qname) %in% qcf$umi,
    )
  sum <- lu_errortype_summary(
    profile = epf,
    digits = 4,
    title = NULL
    )
  colnames(sum) <- c("region", "mismatch", "insertion", "deletion", "total")
  sum_long <- sum %>%
    pivot_longer(!region, names_to = "type", values_to = "pct")
  return(sum_long)
  }

stat_jitter2 <- function(dt, column, y_lab, title, y_int=NULL) {
  p <- dt %>%
  ggplot(aes(
    y = .data[[column]], 
    x = fct_relevel(
      consensus, "kmerCon", "isONclustCon",
      "isONclustCon2", "isONcorCon", "umiCon", "umiConN"
      ))) +
  geom_jitter(
    position = position_jitterdodge(dodge.width = 0.9),
    aes(
      color = factor(
        data, 
        levels = c("pb_ccs", "zymock_r10", "zymock_r9"),
        labels = c("PacBio CCS", "Nanopore R10", "Nanopore R9")), #nolint
      shape = factor(
        type,
        levels = c("mismatch", "insertion", "deletion", "total"),
        labels = c("Mismatch", "Insertion", "Deletion", "Total")
        )
      )) +
  {if(! is.null(y_int))geom_hline(yintercept = y_int, linetype = "dashed")} +
  scale_color_manual(values = brewer.pal(4, "Spectral")[c(4,2,1)]) +
  facet_grid(
    .~factor(bin, levels = c("bin", "nobin"), labels = c("K-mer binning on all reads", "No pre-binning")), #nolint
    scales = "free", space="free_x") +
  labs(
    title = title,
    x = "",
    y = y_lab,
    color = "Data",
    shape = "Error type"
    ) +
  theme_prism() +
  theme(
    legend.title = element_text(),
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90),
  )
  return(p)
}
